statements: SELECT survey_id, question, answer, response_timestamp FROM survey_data;
SELECT * FROM survey_data ORDER BY response_timestamp DESC;
SELECT question, count(*) AS total_responses FROM survey_data GROUP BY question;
SELECT answer FROM survey_data WHERE survey_id = 1;
SELECT survey_id, answer FROM survey_data WHERE response_timestamp >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM survey_data WHERE survey_id = 1 ORDER BY response_timestamp DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT survey_id, question FROM survey_data WHERE question LIKE '%customer%'
SELECT * FROM survey_data WHERE response_timestamp > '2022-01-01' AND response_timestamp < '2022-12-31'
SELECT DISTINCT question FROM survey_data WHERE answer = 'Yes' ORDER BY question ASC
SELECT survey_id, COUNT(*) AS number_of_responses FROM survey_data GROUP BY survey_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 3
SELECT * FROM survey_data;
SELECT survey_id, user_id, survey_title FROM survey_data WHERE survey_date = '2022-01-01';
SELECT user_id, survey_title FROM survey_data WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT tool_name, tool_category FROM visualization_tools WHERE tool_category = 'Data Visualization';
SELECT tool_id, tool_name, tool_description FROM visualization_tools ORDER BY tool_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM survey_data WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000'
SELECT survey_title, survey_date FROM survey_data WHERE survey_date > '2022-01-01'
SELECT * FROM survey_data WHERE survey_title LIKE '%customer satisfaction%'
SELECT survey_id, user_id FROM survey_data ORDER BY survey_date DESC
SELECT survey_title, survey_date FROM survey_data WHERE user_id = '78901234-5678-9012-3456-789012345678'
SELECT * FROM survey_data;
SELECT survey_question, survey_answer FROM survey_data WHERE respondent_id = 1;
SELECT tool_name, documentation_link FROM external_tools WHERE integration_type = 'API';
SELECT dashboard_name, visualization_type FROM dashboard_data ORDER BY dashboard_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM survey_data WHERE survey_question LIKE '%customer%';
SELECT * FROM survey_data WHERE respondent_id = 1;
SELECT survey_question, survey_answer FROM survey_data WHERE survey_question LIKE '%satisfaction%';
SELECT tool_name, documentation_link FROM external_tools WHERE integration_type = 'API';
SELECT * FROM dashboard_data ORDER BY dashboard_id DESC;
SELECT tool_name, integration_type FROM external_tools ORDER BY tool_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM survey_data;
SELECT survey_id, question FROM survey_data WHERE survey_id = 1;
SELECT tool_name FROM tool_data ORDER BY tool_name DESC;
SELECT dashboard_name, dashboard_owner FROM dashboard_data WHERE dashboard_owner = 'Alice';
SELECT viz_id, viz_type, visualization FROM visualization_data WHERE viz_type = 'Bar Chart' ORDER BY viz_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM survey_data WHERE survey_id = 1
SELECT question, answer FROM survey_data WHERE survey_id = 1
SELECT * FROM visualization_data WHERE viz_type = 'bar chart'
SELECT dashboard_name, dashboard_owner FROM dashboard_data WHERE dashboard_owner = 'John Doe'
SELECT dashboard_name FROM dashboard_data ORDER BY dashboard_name DESC
SELECT * FROM survey_data;
SELECT question, response FROM survey_data ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT dashboard_name, owner FROM dashboard_data WHERE id >= 3;
SELECT tool_name, version FROM visualization_tools WHERE id = 2;
SELECT respondent_name, response_date FROM survey_responses ORDER BY response_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM survey_data WHERE id = 1;
SELECT question, response FROM survey_data WHERE response LIKE '%positive%';
SELECT dashboard_name, description FROM dashboard_data ORDER BY dashboard_name ASC;
SELECT tool_name, version FROM visualization_tools WHERE version != '1.0' ORDER BY version DESC;
SELECT respondent_name, response_date FROM survey_responses WHERE response_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
